Express VIs and Functions

Requires: Base Development System. This topic might not match its corresponding palette in LabVIEW depending on your operating system, licensed product(s), and target.

Use the Express VIs and functions to build common measurement tasks.

SubpaletteDescription
Arithmetic & Comparison Express VIsUse the Arithmetic & Comparison Express VIs and functions to perform arithmetic functions and to compare Boolean values, strings, and numeric values.
Execution Control Express VIs and StructuresUse the Execution Control Express VIs and structures to add control and timing to VIs.
Input Express VIsUse the Input Express VIs to gather data or to acquire or simulate signals.
Output Express VIsUse the Output Express VIs to save data to files, to generate reports, to output real world signals, to communicate with instruments, and to display messages to users.
Signal Analysis Express VIsUse the Signal Analysis Express VIs to perform waveform measurements, waveform generation, and signal processing.
Signal Manipulation Express VIsUse the Signal Manipulation Express VIs to manipulate signals and to perform data type conversions.
